RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Special Weight Purse 30000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CRYSTAL D'ORO settled off the early pace, advanced four wide through the far turn and finished well late to be clear under strong handling while racing from the outside. TONI'S M stalked the pace, led near the eighth pole, raced three to four wide in the drive and was no math for the winner. REMEMBERIN RONALD vied for the early lead from the outside of foe and weakened late. DAT GUITAR vied for the early lead near the rail and weakened. HONEST ANGUS chased the pace while racing three wide and faded. TIME TO CLOSE dropped back early, saved ground and had no response. SHE'S MY LOUIE V. broke in the air and trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Time to Close
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Crystal d'Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, 4wd turn, finished well, driving, outside

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 11500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MAY 5, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 5, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claimin g Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CASHEW was bumped at the start, settled near the back early on, made a strong three wide bid nearing the quarter pole and finished well to be well clear late under steady handling. BLUE RIDGE QUEEN showed good early foot to set the early pace but was no match for the winner in the drive. ANGEL OF VERDUN stalked the pace down the backstretch, raced near the rail past the quarter pole and raced evenly late while racing three deep. LAKE RUNNER was bumped, shuffled at the start, raced near the back early and had no late rally. SHE'S MY PRIORITY stalked the pace from the inside and weakened. MISSGREELEY'SSONG dropped back early on, raced from the outside in the stretch and lacked a bid. KEHRON'S CREED tracked the early leader while racing just off the inside and was done early.

ENTRY.NAME: Angel of Verdun
ENTRY.OWNER: Peterson Stephen J and Peterson Konnor

ENTRY.NAME: Lake Runner
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A

ENTRY.NAME: Missgreeley'ssong
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, outside stretch, lacked bid

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 19000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $25,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: B W P SPIRIT prompt the pace from the outside of foes, raced five wide near the half mile pole, moved up to challenge three deep past the quarter pole and drew off late to be clear under strong handling. BILOXI chased the early pace while racing three wide between early and kept on to the wire to finish second best. HARD CANDY chased between, was five wide into the upper stretch and had not enough for the top pair. WOOD RIVER was off slowly, raced at the back of the pack early on, raced from the outside in the stretch run and moved up to improve position. FLASHY BOY vied for the early lead along the rail and faltered in the drivd. THROWIN' SHADE chased the pace between rivals four to five deep and tired. BIG ACE vied for the early lead and tired readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Wood River
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, outside stretch, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: Hard Candy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased between, 5wd upper stretch, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: B W P Spirit
ENTRY.OWNER: Norman, Mark and Norman Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt outside, 5wd 1/2, 3p bid 1/4, drew off, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVD Distaff S. EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 101. Stakes Purse 60000. FOR ACCREDITED LOUISIANA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Free to nominate and start, $600 to enter. Supplemental nominations of $1,200 will be accepted at time of entries which shall include all fees. $60,000 Guaranteed to be divided p er condition book stake structure payout percentages per field size. Three Year Olds 120 lbs. Older 125 lbs. Non winners of $45,000 at a mile or over since February 1, 2023, allowed 3 lbs., such a race of $25,000 in 2023 6 lbs., such a race since Feb . 1, 2023 9 lbs. Preference to horses with the highest total earnings in 2022-2023 at time of entry. Different owners will have equal draw according to preference. Second part of same owner entry will have no consideration over a single interest. Failure to draw into the race will cancel all fees. Trophy to winning owner.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FREE LIKE A GIRL prompt the early pace from the outside of foe, dug in near the eighth pole and held safe under strong handling. A G'S CHARLOTTE rated along off the top pair down the backstretch, ridden through the far turn, took aim at the leader near the three sixteenths pole but couldn't match to finish a game second. MISHPACHAH was off slow, hard sent from the inside to set the pace and weakened a bit the final eighth of a mile. SWEET VIDALIA raced off the early pace, saved ground and lacked a bid. OUR LITTLE GIRL was slow early and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Mishpachah
ENTRY.OWNER: Coteau Grove Farms LLC Yarmuth William and Yarmuth Susan
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, hard sent inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Free Like a Girl
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J Pomier Chasey Deville and Caroom Jerry
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt outside foe, dug in, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 99. Allowance Purse 33000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 5, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STRONG EAGLE prompt the early pace from the outside, was in full command near the five sixteenths pole and held safe to prove best under strong handling. CHROME BABY settle off the early pace, moved up four wide into the upper stretch and finished willingly to the wire. EYE DEE KAY was rated along early under a firm hold, moved up three to four wide in the stretch and was closing in on the top pair belatedly. HYPERBOLIST showed good early foot to set the early lead racing two wide and weakened through the drive. VODKA GIMLET stalked the pace from the inside and faded.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Cajun Miss S. EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 7F Dirt CR: 83. Stakes Purse 60000. FOR ACCREDITED LOUISIANA BRED FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Free to nominate with $300 to enter and $300 to start. Supplemental nominations of $1200 will be accepted at time of entries which shall include all fees. $60,000 Guaranteed to be divided per condit ion book stake structure payout percentages per field size. Weights: 122 lbs. Winners of $60,000 twice since Dec. 1, 2022, to carry additional 2 lbs. Non winners of $45,000 since Dec. 1, 2022, allowed 3 lbs., a race other than maiden, claiming or start er since March 1, 2023, 5 lbs., such a race since 2023 7 lbs. Preference to horses with the highest total earnings in 2022-2023 at time of entry. Different owners and same owner entries will have equal draw according to preference. Failure to draw int o race cancels all fees. Trophy to winning owner and breeder.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STAR MOMENT tracked the early leader while racing two wide, moved up four to five wide into the upper stretch to take command, shifted in through the stretch and drew off to be clear under steady handling. KYLE BEAUTY showed good early foot to set the early pace along the inside, challenged upper stretch, dug in but couldn't match strides in the drive to finish second best. LOUISIANA LIBERTY stalked the pace from the outside racing three wide, swung six to seven wide into the upper stretch and kept on to the wire. ALPINE MIST broke awkwardly, settled early, moved up from the inside to take aim and flattened out. NEW DESTINY raced off the early going, raced three wide near the quarter pole, angled out and had no late rally. BANDIT'S PRIDE settled early, angled widest through the stretch and had no late closing run.

ENTRY.NAME: Alpine Mist
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke awkwardly, inside bid, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: New Destiny
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 3wd 1/4, angled out, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Star Moment
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, 4-5 wide upper stretch, shift in, drove clear

ENTRY.NAME: Louisiana Liberty
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3p, swung 6-7w upper stretch, kept on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 101. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 37000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES AT A MILE OR OVER ON THE TURF SINCE DECEMBER 5, 2022 OR CLAIMING PRICE $30,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 5, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLUE CHEESE raced mid pack early, moved up four wide near the quarter pole while being hard ridden, raced from the far outside in the stretch and just got up late under all out pressure. BUDRO TALKING rated along off the top pair three deep, raced well off the inside in the stretch, dug in late while shifting in a bit and missed in a game effort. COSMIC TRAIN prompt the early pace between rivals near the far turn, dug in near the inside and kept on gamely to the wire. LIKE MIKE showed good early foot from the inside and gave way. MAGEEZ was off slowly and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Cheese
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 4 wide 1/4, outside lane, up, all out

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Creole Lady S. EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 92. Stakes Purse 60000. FOR ACCREDITED LOUISIANA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Free to nominate with $300 to enter and $300 to start. Supplemental nominations of $1200 will be accepted at time of entries which shall include all fees. $60,000 Guaranteed to be divided per condition book stake structure payout percentages per field size. Weights: Three-year-olds 118 lbs. Older 123 lbs. Winners of $60,000 twice since Dec. 1, 2022, to carry additional 2 lbs. Non winners of $45,000 since Dec. 1, 2022, allowed 3 lbs., a race other than maiden, claiming or starter since March 1, 2023, 5 lbs., such a race since 2023 7 lbs. Preference to horses with the highest total earnings in 2022-2023 at time of entry. Different owners and same owner entries will have equal draw according to preference. Failure to draw into race cancels all fees. Trophy to winning owner and breeder.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLASHY MEG tracked the early leader from the outside under a hold, asked through the far turn and finished well to edge clear late under strong handling. WUPKAR showed good early foot along the inside, challenged through the far turn, dug in near the eighth pole and gave way grudgingly to Flashy Meg late. FIRST I'VE SEEN raced mid pack early on, moved up three wide at the quarter pole, angled out to race from the far outside in the stretch and finished gamely. SNOWBALL settled early on, moved up outside through the far turn, swung wide into the upper stretch and flattened out. THAT'S MY MAMA raced off the early going, raced from the outside in the lane and raced evenly late. MYFRIENDSAWINNER void of early speed, raced near the inside and failed to respond. ROYAL O'HAIGAIN stalked the pace from the inside and failed to sustain a bid.

ENTRY.NAME: Royal O'Haigain
ENTRY.OWNER: Pappas Horse Racing Corp and Bartlett Charles
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: That's My Mama
ENTRY.OWNER: Angelle Glenn M and Tamporello Glenn A
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, outside lane, evenly late

ENTRY.NAME: Myfriendsawinner
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, inside, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Snowball
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled early, swung wide upper stretch, flattened out,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 58. Maiden Claiming Purse 16000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DIAL UNCLE JOEY showed good early foot three deep from the outside foe foes, took command and was well clear late while under steady handling. SACRED NATION was unhurried early on, moved up from the outside in the stretch and rallied gamely for the place positiion. MIDNIGHT CROWN stalked the pace, raced five wide past the three sixteenths pole and raced evenly late. STRAY CAT STRUT vied for the early lead from the inside and weakened in the drive. REGINALD AURELIUS took up sharply at the break and never menaced. CUSTOMIZED SPACE was off a step slow, rushed from the inside to contention, tired readily and was eased up on late to race far back.

ENTRY.NAME: Customized Space
ENTRY.OWNER: Colonel Thoroughbreds LLC and Clear Creek Stud LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, rushed inside, stopped, eased up on stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Sacred Nation
ENTRY.OWNER: ELCO Racing LLC and Gallineau Dwayne

ENTRY.NAME: Dial Uncle Joey
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace 3p, drew off, kept to task
